channel.title: Express on IYP UK
channel.description: Recent content in Express on IYP UK

item.title: Nodejs Docker And Aws
item.description: In this post, we will make use of NodeJS and Docker to provide and API which interfaces with an Elasticsearch instance in AWS. Assuming you already have an AWS account, and aws-cli set up. Process Write the NodeJS app locally Wrap it a docker image and deploy this image to a registry (we will use docker hub here) Use AWS ECS (EC2 Container Service) to deploy and scale your app in the cloud.
